name: chaosradio-198
text:
HEADER
Podcast: chaosradio
Episode: chaosradio-198
Starttime: Thu Feb 27 2014 22:00:00 GMT+0100 (CET)
relativeTimestamps: no
Endtime: Thu Feb 27 2014 24:00:00 GMT+0100 (CET)
Podcaster:  Markus Richter <https://twitter.com/monoxyd>, Dmitry, starbug, Thorsten "ths"
Shownoter: @Dr4k3_le <https://twitter.com/Dr4k3_LE>, @kaeffchen_heinz <https://twitter.com/kaeffchen_heinz>, @OfficialCubeX <https://twitter.com/OfficialCubeX>, moe <https://alpha.app.net/moe>, @Quimoniz <https://alpha.app.net/Quimoniz>

Stream: <http://www.fritz.de/live.m3u>
Webseite: <http://chaosradio.ccc.de/chaosradio.html>

/HEADER
